data.title: Economic Impact
data.description: Our digitally aided agric innovations have increased productivity for farmers and improving the economic opportunities available to citizens. These projects create jobs and employment opportunities by providing resources to smallholder farmers to empower them to increase their yields, enhance their livelihoods, and better manage their natural resources to reduce poverty and improve rural development. We create market linkages and give them access to information that can help them to reduce market price volatility and give them more control over their pricing and output. young people.

data.title: Societal & Community Impact
data.description: Our projects increase community connection by providing opportunities to get to know local farmers and purchase directly from them, to strengthen the bond of communities and promote peaceful coexistence. This local economy improves local culture and encourages much-needed cultural integration. One of our long-term objectives is to significantly address and eradicate critical issues of food insecurity, extreme hunger, and poverty, worsened by the advent of the COVID-19 pandemic, conflict and climate change.
